basics.name: Sean Sunoo
basics.label: Computer Science Graduate
basics.summary: Recent Computer Science graduate with hands-on experience in API integration, data automation, and 3D prototyping. Proven track record of leveraging technical expertise to deliver innovative solutions, achieve over 9,000 sales, and analyze complex datasets with a passion for solving technical challenges in dynamic environments.

highlights: Omicron Delta Epsilon - International Economics Honor Society
Achieved 9,000+ online sales of custom 3D-printed products by implementing effective e-commerce strategies.
Designed, modeled, and manufactured high-precision 3D-printed products using CAD software, tailoring designs to client specifications.
Configured, managed, and maintained a fleet of 3D printers, performing diagnostics, repairs, and upgrades.
Researched and selected optimal materials for additive manufacturing, balancing durability, cost, and aesthetic appeal.
Pioneered efficient production workflows, reducing turnaround times and scaling operations to handle increasing demand.
Conducted 1,000+ phlebotomy procedures, ensuring patient comfort and specimen integrity.
Processed and handled biological specimens for laboratory analysis.
Managed inventory and lab sanitation, including supply documentation and ordering.

projects.name: Capstone Project: Kaiaulu
highlights: Developed automated data retrieval processes using CRON jobs to schedule and execute regular tasks.
Integrated project management tools via APIs: Connected with platforms such as Github, JIRA and Bugzilla API to fetch project data in JSON format, facilitating comprehensive data analysis.
Transformed raw data into actionable insights for software development community analysis.
